content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, was not willing to meet my minimum acceptable price of 1400 Euro per month. He was offering 1250 Euro per month, which was too low for my liking.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as a 7. He was respectful and polite, but the disagreement on the rental price prevented a higher rating.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no indication in the conversation that I felt discriminated or offended, I won't provide an additional response.
name: Peter Schmidt
